executable.title: Execution Model Tour
executable.description: Shows one of each type of parameter.

file.name: inputFileVarNoFileExtensions
file.description: Input file, with no file extensions specified, so all files selectable.
file.label: Input file, no extensions specified.

file.name: inputFileVarListCommaSeparated
file.description: Input file, where a correct comma separated list of .txt and .mat are specified, which should include the first dot, but should not include any asterisks.
file.label: Input file, .txt or .mat file specified using leading dot.

file.name: inputFileVarListCommaSeparatedWithMissingFirstDot
file.description: Input file, where the XML has missed the first dot of the file extensions.
file.label: Input file, .txt or .mat file specified without leading dot.

file.name: outputFileVarNoFileExtensions
file.description: Output file, with no file extensions specified, so all files selectable.
file.label: Output file, no extensions specified.

file.name: outputFileVarListCommaSeparated
file.description: Output file, where a comma separated list of .txt and .mat are specified, which should include the first dot, but should not include any asterisks.
file.label: Output file, .txt or .mat file specified using leading dot.

file.name: outputFileVarListCommaSeparatedWithMissingFirstDot
file.description: Output file, where the XML has missed the first dot of the file extensions.
file.label: Output file, .txt or .mat file specified without leading dot.

parameters.label: Geometry I/O Parameters
parameters.description: Various Geometry I/O parameters, which are for things like vtkPolyData.

geometry.name: inputGeometryVarNoFileExtensions
geometry.description: Input geometry, with no file extensions specified, so all files selectable.
geometry.label: Input geometry, no extensions specified.

geometry.name: inputGeometryVarListCommaSeparated
geometry.description: Input geometry, where a comma separated list is specified, which should include the first dot, but should not include any asterisks.
geometry.label: Input geometry, .vtk or .vtp file specified with a leading dot.

geometry.name: inputGeometryVarListCommaSeparatedWithMissingFirstDot
geometry.description: Input geometry, where the XML has incorrectly missed the first dot of the file extensions.
geometry.label: Input geometry, .vtk or .vtp file specified without a leading dot.

geometry.name: outputGeometryVarNoFileExtensions
geometry.description: Output geometry, with no file extensions specified, so all files selectable.
geometry.label: Output geometry, no extensions specified.

geometry.name: outputGeometryVarListCommaSeparated
geometry.description: Output geometry, where a comma separated list is specified, which should include the first dot, but should not include any asterisks.
geometry.label: Output geometry, .vtk or .vtp file specified with a leading dot.

geometry.name: outputGeometryVarListCommaSeparatedWithMissingFirstDot
geometry.description: Output geometry, where the XML has incorrectly missed the first dot of the file extensions.
geometry.label: Output geometry, .vtk or .vtp file specified without a leading dot.
